price: Nítorí náà, (ẹ̀yin ọ̀ṣẹbọ) ẹ rìn (kiri) lórí ilẹ̀ fún oṣù mẹ́rin. Kí ẹ sì mọ̀ pé dájúdájú ẹ̀yin kò lè mórí bọ́ (nínú ìyà) Allāhu. Àti pé dájúdájú Allāhu yóò dójú ti àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna
